description: This module manage MAC pools in oVirt/RHV.

allow_duplicates.description: If (true) allow a MAC address to be used multiple times in a pool.

name.description: Name of the MAC pool to manage.

poll_interval.description: Number of the seconds the module waits until another poll request on entity status is sent.

fetch_nested.description: If I(True) the module will fetch additional data from the API.

nested_attributes.description: Specifies list of the attributes which should be fetched from the API.

ranges.description: List of MAC ranges. The from and to should be splitted by comma.

state.description: Should the mac pool be present or absent.

auth.description: Dictionary with values needed to create HTTP/HTTPS connection to oVirt:

timeout.description: The amount of time in seconds the module should wait for the instance to get into desired state.

wait.description: I(True) if the module should wait for the entity to get into desired state.
